price: Göklerin ve yerin (hazine) anahtarları Onundur. Allah’ın ayetlerine küfredenler işte onlar, hüsrana uğrayacaklar, onlardır.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
